sections.text:
History:Laws 2005, ch. 197, § 1; repealed by Laws 2007, ch. 286, § 5 and Laws 2007, ch. 287, § 5.

Repeals.— Laws 2007, ch. 286, § 5 and Laws 2007, ch. 287, § 5 repealed 9-15B-1 NMSA 1978, as enacted by Laws 2005, ch. 197, § 1, relating to the short title, effective June 15, 2007. For provisions of former section,seethe 2006 NMSA 1978 onNMOneSource.com.

sections.heading: Repealed.
sections.text:
